name: Falconer's Quest
description:
Play as a falcon companion to uncover the secrets of the mysterious obelisks.

Controls:

W/Up arrow: Tilt down

S/Down arrow: Tilt up

A/Down arrow: Tilt left

D/Down arrow: Tilt right

LMB: Boost

RMB: Dive

Falcon model: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-pubg-mobile-falcon-1812506

Falconer: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/lowpoly-modular-armors-free-...

Obelisks: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/obelisk-void-22134...

Rigging and Animation done by me
